item.title: Leveraging JBA Data for Flood Risk Assessment in Rwandaâ€™s Sustainable Landscape Management Framework
item.description: The Rwanda Sustainable Landscape Management Investment Framework (SLM-IF) outlines a comprehensive, long-term plan to encourage sustainable land use and manage natural resources, while restoring degraded ecosystems throughout Rwanda.
